meta.title: Emanuel Flury - Automation Specialist & Swiss Tax Expert
meta.description: Swiss automation expert specializing in AI-driven finance solutions for global teams and Swiss expatriates. Proven track record at Johnson & Johnson and Taxed GmbH.
meta.keywords: Swiss automation expert, AI finance consultant, Swiss tax advisor, automation specialist Switzerland, Swiss expat tax consultant, AI automation consultant, Swiss business automation, finance automation expert

hero.title: Automation Specialist & Swiss Tax Expert
hero.subtitle: Transforming complex finance operations into streamlined, AI-powered solutions for global teams and Swiss expatriates.

services.section_subtitle: Comprehensive automation and tax consulting services

automation.title: Automation Consulting
automation.description: Transform your business processes with cutting-edge AI and automation solutions. From RPA to intelligent workflows, I help companies save time and reduce costs.

tax.title: Swiss Tax Consulting
tax.description: Expert tax advice for Swiss residents and expatriates. Navigate complex Swiss tax regulations with confidence and optimize your tax strategy.

analytics.title: Financial Analytics
analytics.description: Data-driven insights through powerful dashboards and reporting. Transform your financial data into actionable intelligence with Power BI and advanced analytics.

consulting.title: Corporate Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic guidance for international business operations. Leverage my Fortune 500 experience to optimize your corporate processes and strategy.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.subtitle: Real-world impact across automation, tax, and analytics

project1.title: Johnson & Johnson Finance Automation
project1.description: Automated complex financial consolidation processes for global operations, reducing monthly close time by 70% and eliminating manual errors.
project1.technologies: UiPath, Power BI, SQL Server, Python

project2.title: Swiss Expat Tax Platform
project2.description: Built comprehensive tax planning platform for Swiss expatriates, serving 200+ clients across 15 countries with automated compliance tracking.

project3.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
project3.description: Developed executive dashboard providing real-time insights into operational KPIs, enabling data-driven decisions across C-suite.
project3.technologies: Power BI, Azure, DAX, Power Query

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What clients say about working with me

testimonial1.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonial1.text: Emanuel's automation expertise transformed our month-end close process. What used to take 2 weeks now takes 3 days. His attention to detail and deep understanding of finance operations is exceptional.

testimonial2.name: Andreas Weber
testimonial2.text: Working with Emanuel on our tax automation platform was a game-changer. He combines technical excellence with real-world business acumen. Highly recommended for any automation project.

testimonial3.name: Jennifer Thompson
testimonial3.text: Emanuel delivered a Power BI solution that exceeded our expectations. The dashboards he built provide insights we never knew we needed. ROI was achieved within 3 months.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Swiss automation expert with a passion for transforming businesses
about.headline: Bridging Technology and Business
about.bio1: With over 8 years of experience in automation and tax consulting, I help organizations streamline their operations and navigate complex regulatory landscapes. My work at Johnson & Johnson and as co-founder of Taxed GmbH has given me deep expertise in enterprise-scale automation.
about.bio2: I hold degrees from the University of Aberdeen and University of Wisconsin-La Crosse, and I'm passionate about using technology to solve real-world business challenges. When I'm not automating processes, you'll find me sailing—I'm a certified RYA Day Skipper.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your business? Get in touch.
contact.info_description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
